#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	int count=1;
	while(n!=0)
	{
		int arr[n];
		int sum=0, avg;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
			sum+=arr[i];
		}
		avg=sum/n;
		sum=0;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			if(arr[i]>avg)
				sum+=(arr[i]-avg);
		}
		printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n",count,sum);
		scanf("%d",&n);
		count++;
	}
}
